headline: Constellation Brands: Berkshire's Endorsement Might Not Be Enough In The Short-Term (Rating Downgrade)
summary: Constellation Brands experienced a 28% price drop last year due to disappointing performance, reduced outlook, and missed revenue and earnings projections. Learn more on STZ stock here.
